aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.text: I'm looking for a job where I can apply the acquired knowledge and practical experience on large and interesting projects, and also continue to learn and develop myself. Currently, I have experience implementing complex web applications and internal frameworks using React, Node JS.

workExperiences.title: 2022 to 2023 - Freelancing via Young Ones Amsterdam:

roles.p: Maintaining high standards of service and health & safety and helping to deliver the best service to customers.
responsibilities: Mixing drinks, taking orders and ensuring customers are served quickly.
Running the bar in line with health, safety and legal regulations.

roles.role: Waiter – DeVerbroederlJ / Cafe Restaurant Stork, Amsterdam
responsibilities: Greeting customers on arrival and taking food and drink orders
Swiftly resolving any conflicts or issues
Working as part of a team
Handling hot food and serving to the customers

workExperiences.title: 2021 to 2022 - Freight Broker at Land Star Ukraine
responsibilities: Managing freight bookings using a computerised system.
Checking that tax and customs documents are correct and completed in full
Working with national and international suppliers and agents.
Arranging freight deliveries and collections between ports, airports, and warehouses.
Keeping clients up to date and dealing with problems or delays.

workExperiences.title: 2020 to 2021 - Digital Marketing - Ukraine
workExperiences.p: Taking a lead in maintaining and developing a site.
responsibilities: Attending meetings with clients to plan and develop website styles and appearance.
Analysing statistics about who is using the website and writing reports for managers and clients
Reporting technical problems to IT support staff as needed

educationAndTraining: 2020 - Kharkiv National Automobile and Highway University Degree.
2019 – Currently undertaking an online Front End Development Programme with A-Level Ukraine
2013 - Vovchansk Gymnasium Ukraine No.1 General Secondary Level of Education.
rightSide.hobbiesAndInterests: Fishing, Learning English (improving communication skills), kickboxing, hiking, football, volleyball.
